Reviews.Title: fool
Reviews.Author: Albert Paez
Reviews.Content: Blackberry 8320 Red Unlocked GSM PDA WIFI Phonedont lose your money with this seller they sold me a 83020 but is locked dont lose your money i'm from venezuela

Reviews.Title: invalid IMEI number
Reviews.Author: LCM
Reviews.Content: The phone looked very good and was working fine....until I went to conect the Blackberry services to my international phone company they said that the IMEI # was invalid... meaning it had been used before... or cloned. I am still waiting to get a new phone back... hopefully I will get it and it will have a correct or "new" IMEI #.

Reviews.Title: PHONE NOT WORK PIN IMEI INVALID
Reviews.Author: jose antonio gil bohigas "@ARPANET_VZLA"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to operate in Venezuela and when you register the phone with the operator said pin and imei are disabled are not registered on the blackberry server

Reviews.Title: Beautiful phone and works great.
Reviews.Author: Paul Neukom
Reviews.Content: I have purchased quite a few used phones and most have been OK. But this phone is exceptional. It looks like it is brand new and works great. This is by far the nicest phone I have ever owned. Very impressed. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Not really unlocked
Reviews.Author: Lisa Herman
Reviews.Content: Tmobile says this phone is not "fully" unlocked.  Upon further investigation, the PIN and IMEI's are invalid, so no Blackberry Internet Services (email) and no UMA (wifi calling).  Looks like it's going to have to go back since these are important features for me.

Reviews.Title: producto dañado
Reviews.Author: milagros rosal
Reviews.Content: Este producto llego en mal estado, se apagaba solo y ahora no enciendeHe escrito varios correos y nadie me da respuesta a mi reclamo, estoy totalmente insatisfecha con esta compraatentamentemilagros rosalvenezuelamilagroscapote@yahoo.com0414-903-1407
